original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND b.UserId = c.UserId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-22 01:19:43' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=9 AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-20 17:45:15' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-07 01:00:45' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.VoteTypeId=15
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-22 01:19:43'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -1 AND posts.ViewCount >= 0 AND posts.CommentCount <= 9
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.Id)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-20 17:45:15' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-07 01:00:45'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E2E4.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 15
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E6E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E4E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2E4E6.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E6E5E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E4E6E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E4E6E5.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
